text: General Electric Theater is an American anthology series. It was hosted by Ronald Reagan. It was broadcast on CBS radio and television. The series was sponsored by General Electric's Department of Public Relations. It ran from 1953 to 1962. Category:Ronald Reagan Category:American television series Category:1953 establishments in the United States Category:1962 disestablishments Category:1960s disestablishments in the United States Category:English-language television programs
title: General Electric Theater
